roleset.name: stray from the path, not following a straight path

example.name: the one example
example.text: As early as move six, Mr. Kasparov deviated from a well-known sequence of moves, [*-1] developing a knight instead of making a standard bishop attack against the computer's advanced knight.
example.arg: from a well-known sequence of moves,
developing a knight instead of making a standard bishop attack against the computer's advanced knight.

example.name: Arg0, 1
example.text: The cyclist's deviation from the designated path earned him a ticket from the park rangers.

roleset.note: DEVIATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'deviate' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from deviate.01-v predicate notes)
DEVIATED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SHARP-SRED. (from deviated.01-j)
